word: This is how [it will be for]
str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To store up, treasure up, save, lay up. From thesauros; to amass or reserve.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To become rich, be rich, abound in. From ploutizo; to be wealthy.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
